::Fenox::

Fenox follows D to the Iron Fist, watching him sniff it. She looked 
at him as he spoke, a blank expression on her face.

"Flesh?" She asks, wondering what he meant, "What do you mean by 
that?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * D kept moving towards the Iron Fist, his footsteps getting more 
bold the 
> more he approached it.
> His snout lowered to the ground the closer that he got, swirving an 
ear 
> towards Fenox as she spoke, hearing that the base was alright.
> He stopped in front of the ship and sniffed at the armor plating 
which 
> covered it, thinking that it smelled very like the one he had just 
come 
> from.
> But then the thought of the similar smells brought a question into 
his 
> mind...where were the others?
> There had been fleshy humans before, they couldn't have just turned 
into 
> these metal ones. And they wouldn't have just left him, they valued 
him.
> D looked ar Fenox.*
> 
> " Flesh were?"
> 
> * He shook his head, thinking one thing and knowing his mouth had 
said 
> another.*
> 
> " Where flesh?"
> 
> * Flesh meaning the organic people he had known.*
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
